description:
Marknote is a new application for the KDE Plasma desktop environment that lets you create rich text notes and organize them into notebooks.

The post Meet Marknote, KDE’s WYSIWYG Note-Taking Application for Linux appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Meet Marknote, KDE’s WYSIWYG Note-Taking Application for Linux
